Sentencas: The practicability of using a substoichiometric mixture of air and methane to feed the anode compartment of a solid oxide electrochemical reactor has been tested at laboratory level through the operation of a 150W tubular stack.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of CH4 in solid oxide fuel cells: Simulation model of the electrochemical reactor and experimental validation

Sentencas: Fuel is partially oxidized to synthesis gas as an alternative to steam reforming of natural gas in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of CH4 in solid oxide fuel cells: Simulation model of the electrochemical reactor and experimental validation

Sentencas: A simulation model of the electrochemical reactor, including mass, heat and charge balances is presented.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of CH4 in solid oxide fuel cells: Simulation model of the electrochemical reactor and experimental validation

Sentencas: Experimental results confirm the simulation ones and the model gives new insights into the phenomenological behaviour of the whole process.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of CH4 in solid oxide fuel cells: Simulation model of the electrochemical reactor and experimental validation
